Title: MTV Spring Break
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Matt Mira, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (executive story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Hoping to get the true spring break experience, Erica and Barry visit Pops in Florida, yet it's nothing how they expected. Meanwhile, Adam tells the truth to Beverly and Murray but then gets a surprising reaction
